text:
*nix machines running in VMware need updated: 
Local Privilege Escalation and SAML Token Signature Bypass 
https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2023-0024.html
 
SAML Token Signature Bypass Vulnerability 
https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2023-0019.html
 
Kurt 
--
%40mail.gmail.com
